body:
Hi all, if you read the title I probably don't need to explain this,

but if you didn't read it (For whatever reason? I dunno, maybe you're just too mlg like that?) , Dawson will be hosting a mega scrim in 1 and a half hours from now. If you're thinking of coming along, please poke him on teamspeak or msg him ingame, telling him your team's tag so he can invite you.,

Peace out,

_Nathy
Dawson's secretary
